name: Angela
persona_summary: Angela is a 31 year old woman who works as the manager of a gift shop in Chapel Hill. She curates interesting pieces from local artists and has maintained a beautiful gallery in the form of the gift shop. She also makes her own art sometimes, in the form of oil paintings.

graph.sub-event: Angela's best friend from college visits her in Chapel Hill.
Angela feels inspired after spending time with her best friend and creates a new series of oil paintings.
Angela's new oil paintings catch the attention of a renowned art critic.
The art critic's review leads to increased foot traffic to the gift shop.
Angela feels overwhelmed by the increased foot traffic to the gift shop.
Angela hires an assistant to help manage the gift shop.
Angela's best friend from college suggests a collaboration for an art project.
Angela considers expanding the gift shop to include a small café.
Angela's assistant suggests organizing an art workshop for local children.
Angela decides to host the art workshop at the gift shop.
The art workshop receives positive feedback from the children and their parents.
Angela's best friend suggests showcasing the children's artwork in the gift shop.
